text: Arthur William Bell III (June 17, 1945 â€“ April 13, 2018) was an American broadcaster and author. He was the founder and the original host of the paranormal-themed radio program Coast to Coast AM. He also created and hosted its companion show Dreamland. Bell died on April 13, 2018, at age 72, at his home in Pahrump, Nevada of complications from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:American radio personalities Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Libertarians Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from Nevada Category:Writers from North Carolina Category:Writers from Nevada Category:Military people from North Carolina
title: Art Bell
